## timestamp() function

Returns the current timestamp.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function timestamp(): bigint;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

bigint

The number of nanoseconds since the UNIX epoch

## Remarks

The timestamp is the number of nanoseconds since the epoch (start of 1970).
